nodes.text: The Vunakia system was a star system that was located within the Outer Rim Territories' Phelleem sector as a part of the Slice region. It was the origin point of the group known as Vunakians, whose membership included the Human colonel Kohn Doil.
The Vunakia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square S-7.
